SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.game

Class GameIndex

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.game.GameIndex
public class GameIndex extends Object
A utility class for managing the index of saved games. This class is used to keep track of the saved games and their filenames. The index is saved to a JSON file in the saves directory. The index is loaded when the game starts and saved when the game ends.
